sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { GetUsers } from "../server/UserAPI"; import axisLogo from "../Svg/images/axisLogo.webp"; import hdfcLogo from "../Svg/images/hdfcLogo.webp"; import iciciLogo from "../Svg/images/iciciLogo.webp"; import sbiLogo from "../Svg/images/sbiLogo.webp"; import azpay from "../Svg/images/azpay.webp"; import mobikwik from "../Svg/images/mobikwik.webp"; import phonepe from "../Svg/images/phonepe.webp"; import freecharge from "../Svg/images/freecharge.webp"; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import OrderSummmeryContainer from "../containers/OrderSummmeryContainer"; export default function BuyItems(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const [UserData, setUserData] = useState(""); const [PaymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState("UPI"); let PaymentOptionsCommonCode = (

100% Payment Protection, Easy Return Policy

{" "} {" "} {" "} {" "} {" "} {" "}

By placing this order, you agree to Mamaearth's{" "} Terms and Condition {" "} and{" "} Privacy Policy .

); const PaymentDiv = { UPI: (
Pay through UPI QR

Pay using Google Pay, Phone Pe, Paytm and other UPI app from your phone.

Pay using UPI ID

Enter UPI ID (Google Pay, BHIM & more)

{PaymentOptionsCommonCode}
), CreditDebitCard: (
Pay Using Credit Or Debit Cards
{PaymentOptionsCommonCode}
), NetBanking: (

Net Banking

{PaymentOptionsCommonCode}
), Wallets: (

Pay Using Online Wallets

{PaymentOptionsCommonCode}
), COD: (

Cash On Delivery

Do you know you get an Extra 5% Off when you pay online? For everyone’s safety, we advise paying online to limit contact and help stop the spread of the virus.

{PaymentOptionsCommonCode}
), }; let RedeemCode = (
Redeem gift card

Gift card value will be deducted from your total amount

 setApply( <>
Add{" "} On Market {" "} gift card
{" "} setApply(RedeemCode)} >
Gift card value will be deducted from your total amount. You can redeem partial amount from your gift card.
Terms & Conditions
  • Gift card cannot be clubbed in with other promotional coupons and offers.
  • Orders are not subject to cancellation that are placed with gift card.
) } > Apply
); const [Apply, setApply] = useState(RedeemCode); const GetUserData = async () => { if (Object.keys(props.data.UserLogin.LoginData).length !== 0) { // debugger; setUserData( await GetUsers(props.data.UserLogin.LoginData.state.username) ); } }; useEffect(() => { GetUserData(); document .getElementsByClassName("SelectedPayment")[0] .setAttribute("checked", "true"); }, [props]); const PaymentMethodSelecter = (e) => { document .getElementsByClassName("SelectedPayment")[0] .removeAttribute("checked"); document .getElementsByClassName("SelectedPayment")[0] .classList.remove("SelectedPayment"); e.target.classList.add("SelectedPayment"); e.target.setAttribute("checked", "true"); setPaymentMethod(e.target.attributes[3].nodeValue); }; const OrderItems = (element) => { let date = new Date(); let orderId = Math.trunc(Math.random() * 1000000000); props.AddToOrderList({ state: { element, date, orderId, }, }); props.AddToCartHandler({state:"Order Succesfull"}) navigate("/E-commerce/CheckOut/OrderPlaced", { state: { element, date, orderId } }); }; return ( <>
{" "} Hi{" "} {Object.keys(props.data.UserLogin.LoginData).length !== 0 ? props.data.UserLogin.LoginData.state.username : "Geast"} , Welcome to{" "} On Market
Delivery Address
{Object.keys(props.data.UserLogin.LoginData).length !== 0 ? (
{UserData.username}{" "} (default) {" "} HOME
{UserData.username},{UserData.username},{UserData.username} {UserData.phone}
) : null} {Object.keys(props.data.UserLogin.LoginData).length !== 0 ? "DELIVER TO NEW ADDRESS" : "ADD TO ADDRESS"}
Choose payment method
{Apply}
  • PaymentMethodSelecter(e)} />
  • PaymentMethodSelecter(e)} />
  • PaymentMethodSelecter(e)} />
  • PaymentMethodSelecter(e)} />
  • PaymentMethodSelecter(e)} />
{PaymentDiv[PaymentMethod]}
); }
